about_the_game:
Available in English only. Grab the EARTHLOCK Origins Comic Book: The Clay Orchid & The Stormdog.
The first comic book in the EARTHLOCK universe which gives you a unique and personal look into the backstories of Amon and Ive.

The comic book can be accessed by selecting the new title menu option, "Comic Book" after the installation is complete.
